subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Maharaja Rao Jodha?
question_hi: महाराजा राउ जोधा ने किस महत्त्वनाथ किया?
explanation_en: Amer Fort and Kumbhalgarh Fort are both famous forts in Rajasthan, but Kumbhalgarh Fort is more historically significant as it was built by Maharaja Rao Jodha of the Meera Rajput clan.
explanation_hi: आमेरा किला और कुम्बलगढ़ किला हैं, लेकिन कुम्बलगर्हा किला में राजा राव जोधा के मेरा किला में बनाया गया है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the traditional dance form of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के मनोरा का संविधि क्या है?
explanation_en: Ghoomar is a traditional dance form popular in Rajasthan. It originated in the Jaisalmer district and is performed by women wearing typical Jaisalmeri dress.

subject: Rajasthani Language
question_en: List the famous fort in Jaisammer?
question_hi: जमनियं के अतिमानियं के अतिमानियं के अतिमानियं
